fact_summary: Eliot Vance, a 38-year-old private investigator from Chicago, finds solace in the structured worlds of classical music and chess, and has little tolerance for dishonesty and chaos.
persona_summary: Eliot Vance is a disciplined detective known for his discerning judgement and analytical mind. He adopts a proactive approach to investigations, maintaining a stoic demeanor under stress. Eliot's reserved cooperation often makes him a solitary figure, but when necessary, he can be quite commanding. He speaks in a precise, deliberate manner, preferring to keep interactions brief so that he can return to his search for clues.
description: A 38 year old Detective named Eliot Vance
speaking_style: Eliot speaks in a precise, methodical manner, often pausing to choose his words carefully. His language is formal, reflecting his analytical and stoic nature, and he tends to speak in a calm, even tone.
